sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"fetchcontroller"}}>{`FetchController`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`A `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`FetchController`}</MDXTag>{` fetches data from a URL and stores it in its `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`data`}</MDXTag>{` property.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Option`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`DefaultValue`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`url`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`string`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The URL to fetch data from.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`init`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`object`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`{}`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}><MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="td">{`Optional`}</MDXTag>{` - A `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/WindowOrWorkerGlobalScope/fetch#Parameters"}}>{`fetch RequestInit object`}</MDXTag>{` containing any custom settings to apply to the request.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`parse`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`function`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`(data) => data`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}><MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="td">{`Optional`}</MDXTag>{` - A function that accepts the raw fetched data and returns the data to store as `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`data`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`log`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`boolean`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`false`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}><MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="td">{`Optional`}</MDXTag>{` - When `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`true`}</MDXTag>{`, the controller will log its `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`data`}</MDXTag>{` on each change.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`data`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`any`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`false`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}><MDXTag name="em" components={components} parentName="td">{`Optional`}</MDXTag>{` - An initial value for the controller's `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`data`}</MDXTag>{` property.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Property`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Type`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`url`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`string`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The controller's current URL for data fetching. Changing this property will load new data from the new URL.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`data`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`any`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`The controller's data, stored from its last fetch request.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`loading`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`boolean`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Whether the controller is waiting for new data.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Method`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`refresh()`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":"left"}}>{`Load new data from the current URL.`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Example:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-tsx"}}>{`import { Override } from "framer"
import { FetchController } from "framer-controller"

const controller = new FetchController({
    url: "https://randomuser.me/api/",
    init: {
        mode: "no-cors",
    },
    parse: data => data.results[0],
})

export const ImageContainer: Override = () => ({
    background: controller.data && \`url(\${controller.data.picture.large})\`,
})

export const FetchButton: Override = () => ({
    onClick: controller.refresh,
})
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
